title: I stuck on "Authenticating" at login screen.
body: Its there any solution for solving this problem, and I don't know how to use VPN.{{champion:63}}

replies.body: It still looks like Comcast is having some issues around the IL and IN areas, so this might be somewhat related to those issues. Do me a favor and run a quick traceroute using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). Run a trace to our NA servers at 192.64.170.1 and paste what it gives here for me to go over with you.
I'm in Seattle and I'm not using comcast
I am in Turkey atm and I have the same issue. I don't think its Comcast.

I have the same problem. I also tried re-installed and installed on a different driver. 
when it shows "The server is currently busy. Try again later or check the server status"
I can't even close the window. I have to do "Ctrl+Alt+del"
and then I can't launch for most an hour. 
sometimes, It DC when I pick my champions. 
It just nothing happens after count down. 
I have to do "Ctrl+Alt+del" again and then back to the loop

This is happening to me too and it is INCREDIBLY frustrating! Never before have I had this issue. 

I'm from NA, with 40ms. I usually enter my credentials and login immediately. But now, the login status is "Authenticating..."

I ran the Hextech Repair Tool.
I uninstalled and re-installed TO the expected C: drive and not another drive of mine, yet, this issue still happens.

Why is it that the only game I EVER have an issue with is League? Why? It's so annoying. Client issues, login issues, random disconnects. Never, EVER happens in any other game, I swear to you.

Edit: 1 minute after posting this, the "Authenticating..." message disappeared (Failed) and I got a error saying "The server is currently busy. Try again later or check the server status".

Fantastic. Lovely. I was in the middle of a game, carrying my team, having fun, then I randomly disconnect and this happens.
are you living in IL or IN?
